basic.description: Topics include models for dynamical systems, classification of differential equations, methods for solving differential equations, systems of equations and connections with Linear Algebra, stability of dynamical systems and Lyapunov's method, the Laplace Transform method, and numerical and computer methods.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Differential Equations for Engineering Science

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 171, APSC 172, APSC 174 and registered in BSCE.
